data.eml:eml: Contribution to study of the superfamily Cleroidea (Coleoptera) from Iran and adjacent countries: a checklist of Melyridae, Prionoceridae and Trogossitidae

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Mirutenko, Vladyslav, Ghahari, Hassan (2018): Contribution to study of the superfamily Cleroidea (Coleoptera) from Iran and adjacent countries: a checklist of Melyridae, Prionoceridae and Trogossitidae. Zootaxa 4378 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4378.1.2
